sex.Description: sex of the participant as reported by the participant

age.Description: age of the participant on the moment of participation

haircolor.Description: hair color as described by the Fischer-Saller scale

skincolor.Description: skin color as described by the Von Luschan's chromatic scale

handedness.Description: handedness of the participant as a score on the Dutch Handedness Questionnaire

footedness.Description: footedness of the participant as a score on the Waterloo Footedness Questionnaire

musicality.Description: score on the 'musical training' part of the Goldsmiths Musical Sophistication Index

comfortlevel_begin.Description: Comfort level regarding the fNIRS cap as reported by the participant at the beginning of the measurement

comfortlevel_end.Description: Comfort level regarding the fNIRS cap as reported by the participant at the end of the measurement

included.Description: Participant was included in the final analysis

reason_for_exclusion.Description: Reason to exclude the participant from the final analysis if applicable

headcircumference.Description: maximal head circumference of the participant

distance_NzIz.Description: measured distance from nasion to inion

distance_LPARPA.Description: measured distance from left preauricular point to right preauricular point
